text.title: Xu Caihou, former Chinese general, dies aged 71
text.head: Xu Caihou, former Chinese general, dies aged 71
Sources

list.item: "China's former PLA number 2 Xu Caihou dies of cancer amid graft probe" — South China Morning Post , March 16, 2015
Ben Blanchard. "Disgraced former top Chinese officer dies of cancer: Xinhua" — Reuters , March 15, 2015
AP. "Former top Chinese military official Xu Caihou, facing bribery investigation, dies of cancer" — Star Tribune , March 15, 2015
